summary: Add support for updating search attributes on schedules in the TypeScript SDK, following the implementation in the Go SDK.
userImpact: Users cannot update search attributes on schedules in TypeScript, limiting their ability to manage schedule metadata compared to other SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement schedule search attribute update feature following the Go SDK implementation pattern.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented in the TypeScript SDK following the pattern established in Go SDK and temporalio/features#512.
